metadata.title: CVE-2019-7313 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
www/resource.py in Buildbot before 1.8.1 allows CRLF injection in theLocation header of /auth/login and /auth/logout via the redirect parameter.This affects other web sites in the same domain.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

buildbot - 2.0.0-1
buildbot-slave - 2.0.0-1
buildbot-worker - 2.0.0-1
python3-buildbot - 2.0.0-1
python3-buildbot-worker - 2.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: buildbot package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-1').
